name: Treasure Knight (RedOrange)
description:
You are a knight and your goal is to find the treasures inside a temple. Fight enemies and find friends along the way. They can help you fight!

Use arrow keys to move and jump

Hold space to attack

A submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Tilemap
https://kronbits.itch.io/inca-game-assets

Knight Animation
Artwork created by Raphael Gonçalves

https://rgsdev.itch.io/pixel-art-animated-knight-character-pack-rgsdev

Treasure Chest
https://seliel-the-shaper.itch.io/treasure-chests

Health bar
https://adwitr.itch.io/pixel-health-bar-asset-pack

Explosion animation
https://ansimuz.itch.io/explosion-animations-pack
